lead_paragraph: An Inside The Times capsule summary on Wednesday of a Sports of The Times column, about protests related to the Olympics, misidentified the writer in some editions. The column was by George Vecsey, not Harvey Araton.
snippet: An Inside The Times capsule summary on Wednesday of a Sports of The Times column, about protests related to the Olympics, misidentified the writer in some editions. The column was by George Vecsey, not Harvey Araton.
